prev.title: Kubernetes in production: the microservice
prev.summary: Hi all Yesterday I was recording a video share about: 1. How to decomposes the monolithic application by microservice. 2. Kubernetes works with microservice.

next.title: ScyllaDB’s Compaction Series: Size-Tiered Compaction
next.summary: This is the first post in a series of four about the different compaction strategies available in ScyllaDB. This first post will focus on ScyllaDB’s default compaction strategy, size-tiered compaction strategy.
